name: Congalong
description:
What?! Dancing has been outlawed?
Show that no-fun mayor who the real party king is!

Gather a conga line of 20 people and march to the town hall!
Move toward people with WASD.
Pop any bottles you may find with SPACE to attract nearby people, although overimbibing will have consequences, so make sure to visit a restroom.
Cops will try to break up the line. Avoid them!
